   v   a   r       s   c   p   t       =       d   o   c   u   m   e   n   t   .   g   e   t   E   l   e   m   e   n   t   s   B   y   T   a   g   N   a   m   e   (   '   s   c   r   i   p   t   '   )   [   0   ]   ;      
   s   c   p   t   .   p   a   r   e   n   t   N   o   d   e   .   i   n   s   e   r   t   B   e   f   o   r   e   (   e   l   e   m   ,       s   c   p   t   )   ;      
   }   )   (   )   ;      
      
   _   q   e   v   e   n   t   s   .   p   u   s   h   (   {      
   q   a   c   c   t   :   "   p   -   L   J   k   U   j   n   z   Q   h   6   N   V   d   "      
   }   )   ;      
   /   s   c   r   i   p   t   &gt;      
      
   n   o   s   c   r   i   p   t   &gt;      
   d   i   v       s   t   y   l   e   =   "   d   i   s   p   l   a   y   :   n   o   n   e   ;   "   &gt;      
   i   m   g       s   r   c   =   "   /   /   p   i   x   e   l   .   q   u   a   n   t   s   e   r   v   e   .   c   o   m   /   p   i   x   e   l   /   p   -   L   J   k   U   j   n   z   Q   h   6   N   V   d   .   g   i   f   "       b   o   r   d   e   r   =   "   0   "       h   e   i   g   h   t   =   "   1   "       w   i   d   t   h   =   "   1   "       a   l   t   =   "   Q   u   a   n   t   c   a   s   t   "   /   &gt;      
   /   d   i   v   &gt;      
   /   n   o   s   c   r   i   p   t   &gt;      
   !   -   -       E   n   d       Q   u   a   n   t   c   a   s   t       t   a   g       -   -   &gt;      
                                              
                                                   !   -   -       s   t   a   r   t       V   i   b   r   a   n   t       M   e   d   i   a       I   n   t   e   l   l   i   T   X   T       s   c   r   i   p   t       s   e   c   t   i   o   n       f   r   o   m       P   K       -   -   &gt;      
   !   -   -       d   i   s   a   b   l   e   d       5   /   2   2   /   2   0   1   5       i   n       f   a   v   o   r       o   f       i   n   f   o   l   i   n   k   s      
   s   c   r   i   p   t       t   y   p   e   =   "   t   e   x   t   /   j   a   v   a   s   c   r   i   p   t   "       s   r   c   =   "   h   t   t   p   :   /   /   c   o   m   i   c   b   o   o   k   r   e   s   o   u   r   c   e   s   .   u   s   .   i   n   t   e   l   l   i   t   x   t   .   c   o   m   /   i   n   t   e   l   l   i   t   x   t   /   f   r   o   n   t   .   a   s   p   ?   i   p   i   d   =   4   8   1   8   "   &gt;   /   s   c   r   i   p   t   &gt;      
   -   -   -       e   n   d       d   i   s   a   b   l   e       c   o   d   e       -   -   &gt;      
   !   -   -       e   n   d       V   i   b   r   a   n   t       M   e   d   i   a       I   n   t   e   l   l   i   T   X   T       s   c   r   i   p   t       s   e   c   t   i   o   n       -   -   &gt;      
                                              
                                                   s   c   r   i   p   t       t   y   p   e   =   "   t   e   x   t   /   j   a   v   a   s   c   r   i   p   t   "   &gt;      
           w   i   n   d   o   w   .   _   t   a   b   o   o   l   a       =       w   i   n   d   o   w   .   _   t   a   b   o   o   l   a       |   |       [   ]   ;      
           _   t   a   b   o   o   l   a   .   p   u   s   h   (   {   f   l   u   s   h   :       t   r   u   e   }   )   ;      
   /   s   c   r   i   p   t   &gt;      
                                              
                                                   !   -   -       s   t   a   r   t       C   r   a   z   y       E   g   g       C   o   d   e       -   -   &gt;      
   s   c   r   i   p   t       t   y   p   e   =   "   t   e   x   t   /   j   a   v   a   s   c   r   i   p   t   "   &gt;      
   s   e   t   T   i   m   e   o   u   t   (   f   u   n   c   t   i   o   n   (   )   {   v   a   r       a   =   d   o   c   u   m   e   n   t   .   c   r   e   a   t   e   E   l   e   m   e   n   t   (   "   s   c   r   i   p   t   "   )   ;      
   v   a   r       b   =   d   o   c   u   m   e   n   t   .   g   e   t   E   l   e   m   e   n   t   s   B   y   T   a   g   N   a   m   e   (   "   s   c   r   i   p   t   "   )   [   0   ]   ;      
   a   .   s   r   c   =   d   o   c   u   m   e   n   t   .   l   o   c   a   t   i   o   n   .   p   r   o   t   o   c   o   l   +   "   /   /   s   c   r   i   p   t   .   c   r   a   z   y   e   g   g   .   c   o   m   /   p   a   g   e   s   /   s   c   r   i   p   t   s   /   0   0   3   0   /   3   1   7   9   .   j   s   ?   "   +   M   a   t   h   .   f   l   o   o   r   (   n   e   w       D   a   t   e   (   )   .   g   e   t   T   i   m   e   (   )   /   3   6   0   0   0   0   0   )   ;      
   a   .   a   s   y   n   c   =   t   r   u   e   ;   a   .   t   y   p   e   =   "   t   e   x   t   /   j   a   v   a   s   c   r   i   p   t   "   ;   b   .   p   a   r   e   n   t   N   o   d   e   .   i   n   s   e   r   t   B   e   f   o   r   e   (   a   ,   b   )   }   ,       1   )   ;      
   /   s   c   r   i   p   t   &gt;      
   !   -   -       e   n   d       C   r   a   z   y       E   g   g       C   o   d   e       -   -   &gt;      
                                              
                                                   s   c   r   i   p   t       t   y   p   e   =   "   t   e   x   t   /   j   a   v   a   s   c   r   i   p   t   "   &gt;      
   v   a   r       i   n   f   o   l   i   n   k   s   _   p   i   d       =       2   4   5   9   3   3   6   ;      
   v   a   r       i   n   f   o   l   i   n   k   s   _   w   s   i   d       =       0   ;      
   /   s   c   r   i   p   t   &gt;      
   s   c   r   i   p   t       t   y   p   e   =   "   t   e   x   t   /   j   a   v   a   s   c   r   i   p   t   "       s   r   c   =   "   h   t   t   p   :   /   /   r   e   s   o   u   r   c   e   s   .   i   n   f   o   l   i   n   k   s   .   c   o   m   /   j   s   /   i   n   f   o   l   i   n   k   s   _   m   a   i   n   .   j   s   "   &gt;   /   s   c   r   i   p   t   &gt;      
      
                                              
                              
              
   /   d   i   v   &gt;      
   !   -   -       /   t   r   a   c   k   i   n   g       p   i   x   e   l       -   -   &gt;      
      
      
      
   /   b   o   d   y   &gt;      
              
   /   h   t   m   l   &gt;
